sentences.sContent: We will review your situation and decide how we can help you.
sentences.sCn: 我们会研究你的情况，然后决定如何帮助你。

sentences.sContent: The decision will be reviewed by the Supreme Court.
sentences.sCn: 这个判决将由最高法院复核。

sentences.sContent: The team manager’s position will be reviewed at the end of the season.
sentences.sCn: 球队主教练的人选将在赛季末重新考虑。

sentences.sContent: If you have to cover 12 chapters in American history, begin by planning on three two-hour reviews with four chapters per session.
sentences.sCn: 如果你必须涵盖美国史的12个章节，首先计划3次2小时的复习，每次4章。

sentences.sContent: ...you just need to review your marks and you can save a lot of time...

synos.tran: 回顾；复习；评论；检讨；检阅

phrases.pCn: 文献回顾；文献综述；文献评论
服务表现检讨；业绩评价
管理评审，管理审查；管理评论

trans.tranOther: to examine, consider, and judge a situation or process carefully in order to see if changes are necessary
